sentences: The weather was sunny with a gentle breeze.
It's more convenient to not have to take shoes on and off every time you go in and out.

today_delta.title: EBS 라디오 입이 트이는 영어 - 2.4Claw Machine

message:
오늘의 영어 공부 (2026-02-04)

[오늘의 단어]
- plush: 부드럽고 푹신한
- arcade: 게임센터
- self-control: 절제력
- snap: 끊어지다
- desperately: 필사적으로, 절망적으로
- burn through: 탕진하다
- impulsively: 충독적으로, 즉흥적으로
- prep: 자율학습, 시험 준비하다
- enhance: 높이다
- enormous: 막대한
- lifespan: 평균 수명
- consistently: 꾸준하게

[오늘의 문장]
- I wanted to play, too, but I held myself back.
- My self-control snapped.
- I should have kept my cool but it's not easy.
- We were filled with anticipation.
- The weather was sunny with a gentle breeze.
- It's more convenient to not have to take shoes on and off every time you go in and out.
